question:
Which among the following plateaus of the world and their location is/are correctly matched?
  1. Tibetan Plateau - West Asia
  2. Colorado Plateau - Southwestern part of USA
  3. Kimberley Plateau - Australia
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: The Tibetan Plateau (Tibet) is also known as the "Roof of the World". It is located in Central Asia. It is formed due to the collision of the Indo-Australian and the Eurasian tectonic plates.
